name: Luigi Vs. The Belly Button Eater (UNFINISHED!!!)
name_original: Luigi Vs. The Belly Button Eater (UNFINISHED!!!)
description:
OH SHIT!!!!!! Mario and Luigi (and also Yoshi) didn't get any candy from last night's Halloween because they're losers!!! So Mario sends Luigi to the Dark Eastwood Forest to get them the giant jar of Jawbreakers hidden there. But Luigi is too scared, because that's where the Belly Button Eater lives! But Mario sends him off anyway because he's an ass. Will Luigi get that giant jar of Jawbreakers for them chow down on for weeks and weeks on end? Or will his belly button get eaten.

This game is unfinished currently. There will be a completed post-Jam version sometime in the future.

Controls:

X - Jump

Z - Shoot (for Level 3)

Arrow Keys - Move

Enter/Return - Start
